description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows iSCSI service denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-35270), apply the relevant updates as detailed below:

1. Download and install the appropriate KB updates based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, apply **KB5040442**.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, apply **KB5040427**.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64/32-bit Systems, apply **KB5040431**.
   - For Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems, apply **KB5040448**.

2. Ensure that your system is updated to the mentioned build versions to ensure compatibility.
3. Restart your system after installation to confirm that the updates are properly applied.

**Details**:
- The updates resolve issues related to uncontrolled resource consumption that can lead to denial of service.
- For manually downloading the updates, use the following links:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
  - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

**Preconditions**:
- Determine the specific build version of your Windows system before applying updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
